Goal:
-Match up samples between 16S and ITS datasets


```{r}
# read in data 
fung_ps <- readRDS("../intermediates/decontam_fung_physeq_otus_sampletype_cull.rds") 
fung_otu_table <- data.frame(otu_table(fung_ps)) # 35588 OTUs, 1513 samples

bact_otu_table <- readRDS("../16s_data/kk_bact_otu_table_no_aer_no_fungcorp.rds") # 110592 OTUs, 1575 samples


full_met <- read.csv("../metadata/all_waimea_hiseq_sample_metadata.csv") # 3468 samples
full_met <- full_met[full_met$habitat %in% c("Marine","Terrestrial","Riverine"),] # 3206 samples
full_met$x_seq_id <- paste0("X", full_met$sequencing_id)

fung_metadata <- full_met[full_met$x_seq_id %in% names(fung_otu_table),] # 1513 samples
bact_metadata <- full_met[full_met$sequencing_id %in% names(bact_otu_table),] # 1466 samples

bact_meta_raw <- full_met[grep("16S", full_met$locus, ignore.case = T),] # 1620 samples
```

```{r}
fung_meta_match <- fung_metadata[fung_metadata$sample_id %in% bact_metadata$sample_id,]
```

```{r}
# subset otu tables by samples matched in 16S and ITS
fung_otu_match <- fung_otu_table[,colnames(fung_otu_table) %in% fung_meta_match$x_seq_id] # 1372 samples remain
fung_otu_match <- fung_otu_match[rowSums(fung_otu_match)>0,] # 34126 otus remain (1462 removed)

bact_otu_match <- bact_otu_table[,colnames(bact_otu_table) %in% bact_meta_match$sequencing_id] # 1372 samples remain
bact_otu_match <- bact_otu_match[rowSums(bact_otu_match)>0,] # 100187 otus remain (10405 removed)


saveRDS(fung_otu_match, "../intermediates/fungal_otu_table_matched_up.rds")
saveRDS(fung_meta_match, "../intermediates/fungal_otu_metadata_matched_up.rds")
saveRDS(bact_otu_match, "../intermediates/bact_otu_table_matched_up.rds")
saveRDS(bact_meta_match, "../intermediates/bact_otu_metadata_matched_up.rds")
```
